attributes.action: Stop manufacturers making goods and then making them obsolete after a short period of time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Manufacturing companies are making items for sale and within a short period of time they become obsolete and you can not get parts to repair them so they have to go to the land field sites.  Please make manufacturers be responsible in keeping parts in stock for at least 10 years this should cut down the landfill sites getting fall too quick
